created.description: The time at which the playbook was originally created.

description.description: Primary classification use case the data are prepared for, e.g. DGA, Phishing, Application identification, Host profiling, ...

id.description: A value that uniquely identifies the playbook.

impact.description: A positive integer that represents the impact the playbook has on the organization from 0 to 100.

label.description: An optional set of terms, labels or tags associated with this playbook.

modified.description: The time that this particular version of the playbook was last modified.

organization-type.description: Type of an organization, that the playbook is intended for.

playbook-abstraction.description: Identifies the level of completeness of the playbook.

playbook-type.description: Identifies types of actions in the playbook.

priority.description: A positive integer that represents the priority of this playbook relative to other defined playbooks.

revoked.description: A boolean that identifies if the playbook creator deems that this playbook is no longer valid.

severity.description: A positive integer that represents the seriousness of the conditions that this playbook addresses.

valid-from.description: The time from which the playbook is considered valid and the steps that it contains can be executed.

valid-until.description: The time at which this playbook should no longer be considered a valid playbook to be executed.

description: Security playbook with its metadata for executing course of action in cyberspace defense.
name: security-playbook
